00030 //! Base class for digital storage oscilloscope.
00031 class XDSO : public XPrimaryDriver
00032 {
00033     XNODE_OBJECT
00034 protected:
00035     XDSO(const char *name, bool runtime,
00036          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00037          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00038          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00039          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00040 public:
00041     //! usually nothing to do.
00042     virtual ~XDSO() {}
00043     //! show all forms belonging to driver.
00044     virtual void showForms();
00045 protected:
00046     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00047     virtual void start();
00048     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00049     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00050     virtual void stop();
00051   
00052     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00053     //! record is readLocked
00054     virtual void visualize();
00055   
00056     //! driver specific part below
00057 public:
